name: Cat Eye Padrone Bike Computer
description: With no wires to get in your way and a large, easy to read screen, this bike computer is a great addition to your cockpit. Keep focused on the road or trail, and let the large, high-contrast display tell you all about your ride at a glance.Wireless set-up.Current speed.Maximum speed.Average speed.Trip distance.Total distance.Elapsed time.Clock.FlexTight™ universal bracket fits all handlebars and stems.Coin cell batteries in the computer and sensor, computer lasts around 1 year with 1 hour a day of use, sensor lasts for approximately 10,000km of riding.Easy to use ClickTec™ button controls.Large displayDimensions: 68 x 43 x 15mm.
